duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist high producing Loan Officers in the smooth and timely completion of loan applications.
Provide administrative, business development, and marketing support for Loan Officers.
Facilitate application processing and clear conditions to facilitate loan closing.
Proactively communicate with all parties about loan statuses and participate in weekly pipeline updates.
Aid in the development of a customer database and prepare materials for events and presentations.
Perform clerical, administrative, and proactive support duties for Loan Officers.
Meet training goals set by manager and contribute to the training of peers.
